title: The tenements available in a scheme shall be allotted to the Protected and Non Protected occupiers i
clause_text: The tenements available in a scheme shall be allotted to the Protected and Non Protected occupiers in the manner provided herein after – The Protected occupier of the said scheme shall be accommodated first.
section: ALLOTMENT OF THE TENEMENTS TO THE NON PROTECTED OCCUPIERS

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
